comments:
When a TPTP AGR test suite that was developed on TPTP4.2.0 is executed on TPTP4.2.1 platform, the exception "The launch mode "run" is not supported for the test specified in the launch configuration" occurs (see below for details).

Details of Environment:

eclipse-SDK-3.2-linux-gtk.tar.gz
emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-2.2.0.zip
tptp.runtime-TPTP-4.2.1-200607240100.zip
org.eclipse.tptp.test.auto-TPTP-4.2.1-200607240100.zip
tptpdc.linux_ia32-TPTP-4.2.1-200607240100.zip


Test started!
Test 'test-resources/Java.testsuite' executing
java.lang.Throwable: The launch mode "run" is not supported for the test specified in the launch configuration
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.TestCorePlugin.logError(TestCorePlugin.java:214)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.validate(AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:90)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.BasicTestLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.validate(BasicTestLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:117)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.launch(AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:162)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:558)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.services.AbstractTestExecutionService.launch(AbstractTestExecutionService.java:615)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.services.AbstractTestExecutionService.execute(AbstractTestExecutionService.java:425)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.server.AbstractService.execute(AbstractService.java:43)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.server.ServiceProxy$1.run(ServiceProxy.java:140)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.core.utils.ReusableThread.run(ReusableThread.java:131)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:797)
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: IWAT4037E Problems found in Launch Configuration. See error log for detailed status.
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.launch(AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:166)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
        at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:558)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.services.AbstractTestExecutionService.launch(AbstractTestExecutionService.java:615)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.services.AbstractTestExecutionService.execute(AbstractTestExecutionService.java:425)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.server.AbstractService.execute(AbstractService.java:43)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.server.ServiceProxy$1.run(ServiceProxy.java:140)
        at org.eclipse.hyades.automation.core.utils.ReusableThread.run(ReusableThread.java:131)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:797)

This is happening for all test types.  I'm not able to run any tests using a 4.2.1 driver.

I tried this with TPTP-4.2.1-200607250100 and TPTP-4.2.1-200607261240 with IAC & AC.  I keep getting the following stack trace in the workspace log file:

java.lang.Throwable: The launch mode "run" is not supported for the test specified in the launch configuration
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.TestCorePlugin.logError(TestCorePlugin.java:214)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.validate(AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:90)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.BasicTestLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.validate(BasicTestLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:117)
at org.eclipse.hyades.test.core.launch.delegates.AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.launch(AbstractLaunchConfigurationDelegate2.java:162)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:754)
at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:944)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Jerome, any ETA for a fix for this? This is blocking BVTs tests in Ottawa.

Julien,

Could you please, have a look at this defect ?
Thanks
Jerome
Fixed (associated bugzilla in CVS is bugzilla_138736 since this problem was first reported in a comment in this defect).
*** Bug 152748 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Please set the target to the release that the fix for this defect will first appear.

traces.message: IWAT4037E Problems found in Launch Configuration. See error log for detailed status.
